data.message: Hello facebook response team i have submitted some id already and appeal for my facebook account that was disabled a few days ago but i cant still access it. How many more days do i have to wait because i really need my account back. It's so disappointing because it takes too much time for me to get it back again. Is there a chance that i might not be able to access my account anymore?? i have submited an appeal form tho. please do something.

replies.message: Hi Darius. Due to the volume of identification requests we receive, it may take us some time to get to yours. Thank you for your patience! -Elizabeth
